availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, laborer and resident. Native of Bavaria, Germany. Married to Lena Nunn. Father of Ella Nunn, Mary Nunn, Rosette Nunn, Henry Nunn, Anna Nunn, and Dora Nunn. Laborer in McCracken County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah and Suburbs, p. 157A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 132A.
Find A Grave, "Philip H. Nunn (1818-1887)," Memorial #84269308, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84269308 (accessed January 28, 2021).
